# je_api_testka

---

## API Testka as automation framework for API testing

### Features

* HTTP Method test
* Get response data body etc...
* Action file and executor
* result compare
* xml to json and json to xml
* Soap test
* Generate HTML Report
* CLI with action file

## install

```
pip install je_api_testka
```

## Requires

```
python 3.7 or later
```
